alert.note: Alert for Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 4:11PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A shower producing small hail will impact portions of south central Monterey County through 445 PM PDT... At 411 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a shower producing small hail over Gorda, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gorda. This includes Highway 1 between Mile Markers 12 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest
